thread.title: Watch Bas Keep Change BMX Forever With His Insane Wallrides Project
thread.title_full: Watch Bas Keep Change BMX Forever With His Insane Wallrides Project

author: Marcus Cho
title: Watch Bas Keep Change BMX Forever With His Insane Wallrides Project
text:
Sebastian “Bas” Keep’s latest BMX edit is pretty innovative in the level of intensity it takes on – following his ambition to do it up bigger than before, Keep used ramps to access some of the most previously difficult to find street spots in the United Kingdom.
“These were the ones that I really had to prepare for, I spent months getting ready physically and mentally,” says Keep. Taking on spots like Croydon and Hastings, you’ll find that Keep’s newest edit keeps you on edge as he wall rides and does some of the craziest stunts you’ll ever see – and you really have to see it to believe it.
You can watch a short clip below while the entire behind-the-scenes footage is available above.
